title: ✿ BEAUTIFUL Lakeview studio - W/D IN UNIT - air conditioning
posting_body: ['SEE VIDEO (copy and paste the YouTube link into your browser):  <URL>', '2912 N. Mildred, 1st floor', 'Beautiful studio apartment for rent in Lakeview!', ' This is a high 1st floor unit in a walk-up building at Mildred and George.', ' Only two blocks from both the Diversey and the Wellington brown line stations.', 'Available September 1st', 'Hardwood floors', 'Granite / stainless steel kitchen', 'Dishwasher', 'Combo washer / dryer IN UNIT', 'Built in wall heating and air conditioning unit', 'Cooking gas is included', 'Tenants pay for electric and a $40/month utility fee for water/trash/sewer', 'Bike room in the basement', 'Street parking only', 'Pets ~40 pounds or less are welcome (two pets max) - dogs with a $500 pet fee and cats a $295 pet fee', 'Living room 15\'2" x 9\'4"', 'Kitchen 6\'1" x 5\'7"', 'Dining area 6\'8" x 5\'9"', 'Bathroom 6\'2" x 4\'6"', 'Closet 5\'3" x 4\'8"', '$395 non-refundable move-in fee per apartment (no security deposit)', '$45 application/credit check fee per adult applicant', 'To see, call or email', 'Heidi Sonnenberg', 'The Square One Team', 'Applications are taken on a first come, first serve basis.', 'To rent this apartment, the following are due up front:', "1)  First month's rent", '2)  Application fee(s)', '3)  Move-in fee and pet fee(s)']
